attributes.action: Change the standard age of opening a Limited Company bank account to age 16
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am Luke Derbyshire and recently opened a limited company named 'Pro Gamer Gear UK Limited' - ok, you have to be 16 to open the company. Great stuff. 

Come round to finding a bank account and only 1 place would do it due to my age - this is appauling.

Why are you allowed to incorporate a company at 16 yet to get the company bank account that you need to run it you have to search for hours or become 18.
